item.description:
Join Sitzundjiber members and guests at our After Work at The Daily Catch in Boston’s popular Seaport District at the Fan Pier. We will be socializing outside on the patio, enjoying the summer weather (hopefully!) and being by the water.

The Daily Catch has been a family-owned and operated restaurant, since 1973! New this year is an outside bar to be completed in June and a newly-renovated interior.

Light hors d’oeuvres will be provided compliments of Sitz. And, in case of REALLY inclement weather, we will move inside.

Getting there and Parking

Parking is on the street (please note: some Boston meters go until 8:00pm) or in nearby parking lots.

Public Transportation is via the Silver Line on Seaport Boulevard at Pittsburg Street, Courthouse Station, South Boston Waterfront.

Later

Later, some may wish to stroll over to the Boston Harbor Hotel to sway to the music of ‘Summer Soul,’ performing that evening in the hotel’s Summer in the City Entertainment Series (until 10pm).

Hope to see you there!
item.name: An afterwork & more!!!
